game.name: Hoopervania
game.desc:
COUNT DRACULA CHALLENGES YOU... ARE YOU UP TO THE TASK?
Welcome to HooperVania, a free and non-profit French fan-game celebrating Castlevania, the French videomaker Hooper, his community and video games as a whole! Navigate through various stages using the famous Vampire Killer to defeat numerous enemies, large bosses and ultimately vanquish Dracula himself!
